00055 class cftpmod : public cmod {
00056         protected:
00057                 auto_ptr<cinfodb> idb;
00058                 static const char _id[];
00059                 static const char _conf[];
00060                 static const char _name[];
00061 
00062                 void act();
00063 
00065                 struct _cmp : public unary_function<const cinfodb::ftp_info &, bool> {
00066                         string id;
00067                         result_type operator ()(argument_type ptr) {
00068                                 return ptr.id == id ? true : false;
00069                         }
00070                 } cmp;
00071 
00072                 void rmspace(string &);
00073                 bool valid(const string &);
00074         public:
00075                 cftpmod( cenvironment &  );
00076                 const char *id() { return _id; }
00078 
00079                 const char *name() { return ""; }
00080                 const char *menu() { return ""; }
00082                 const char *conf(); 
00083                 char run();
00084                 virtual ~cftpmod() {}
00085 };
